## Results 1 - stromal_panel_plot
```{r result1}
# patchwork
patchwork::wrap_plots(
    get_plot("stromal_panel_plot"),
    get_plot("stromal_celltype_heatmap"),
    heights = c(3, 1),
    ncol = 1
)


# gridExtra
gridExtra::grid.arrange(
    grobs = list(
        get_plot("mpg_disp"),
        get_plot("mpg_qsec") +
            theme(legend.position = "none")
    ),
    layout_matrix = matrix(c(1,1,1,2), ncol = 1),
    ncol = 1
)

```
